pages.text: The $(mob)Blitz$() is a monster that spawns in sandy biomes and $(thing)Savannas$(). It floats in the air and attacks players on sight.$(p)Its attacks consists of volleys of 3 projectiles. These projectiles apply $(thing)Blindess$() on hit.

$(mob)Blitzes$() drop $(item)Blitz Rods$() on death. It can be crafted into $(item)Blitz Powder$(), which can then be brewed into $(item)Potions of Levitation$() or crafted into $(item)Aerotheum Dust$().
